content:
With a willingness to invest in quality, you'll find that many brands offer high-waisted, four-way stretch yoga pants that rival Lululemon's Wunder Unders. Here are some additional recommendations:

1. **Alala**: Their Vida Legging is a high-end option with a high-waisted fit, four-way stretch, and a sleek design. They're known for their comfortable, sweat-wicking fabric and attention to detail. ($128)
2. ** Girlfriend Collective**: This brand offers high-quality, affordable leggings with a high-waisted fit and four-way stretch. Their leggings are made from recycled plastic bottles and are super comfortable. ($68)
3. **Prana**: Prana's Halle Pant is a popular choice among yogis, featuring a high-waisted fit, four-way stretch, and a sustainable fabric blend. They're known for their comfortable, durable designs. ($89)
4. **Carbon38**: This brand offers high-end, technical leggings with a high-waisted fit and four-way stretch. Their fabrics are designed for performance and comfort, making them ideal for yoga and beyond. ($125)
5. **Manduka**: Manduka's Pro Legging is a high-quality option with a high-waisted fit, four-way stretch, and a comfortable design. They're known for their eco-friendly fabrics and durable construction. ($98)

All of these brands offer high-quality, comfortable yoga pants with features similar to Lululemon's Wunder Unders. You may find that you prefer one over the others, so I recommend checking out reviews, reading about the fabrics and features, and maybe even trying out a pair before committing to a purchase.

Remember, investing in a good pair of yoga pants can make a big difference in your practice and overall comfort. Happy shopping!
